document.full_text: world number one rafa nadal produced some outstanding tennis to crush long standing rival roger federer 6-3 6-2 on friday and reach the final of the sony ericsson open in miami.
document.title: impressive nadal crushes below-par federer
lines_and_colors: world number one rafa nadal produced some outstanding tennis to crush long standing rival roger federer 6-3 6-2 on friday and reach the final of the sony ericsson open in miami.
